title: Pyrotechnicon
description: BY HIS NOSE YOU MAY KNOW HIMCyrano de Bergerac: lover, poet, inventor, swordsman — man of ferocious blade and pretty talent. Now it can be told: his final, most daring adventure — a fight to the death against the dread Master of Secrets, with the life of his beloved Roxane in the balance.
author: Adam Browne
